mapper.select: SELECT PID, C.CID, PNAME, PPRICE, PINFO, PSTOCK, PENROLL, PSELL, C.CNAME FROM PRODUCT P, CATEGORY C WHERE P.CID = C.CID
SELECT PID, C.CID, PNAME, PPRICE, PINFO, PSTOCK, PENROLL, PSELL, C.CNAME FROM PRODUCT P, CATEGORY C WHERE P.CID = C.CID AND PNAME = #{ pname }
SELECT USERID, USERNAME, GENDER, AGE FROM MEMBER
SELECT USERID, USERNAME, GENDER, AGE FROM MEMBER WHERE USERID = #{userId}
SELECT TO_CHAR(PENROLL, 'MM') AS SALESDATE, SUM(PSELL) AS QUANTITY FROM PRODUCT GROUP BY TO_CHAR(PENROLL, 'MM') ORDER BY SALESDATE
SELECT SUM(PPRICE*PSELL) AS TOTALINCOME FROM PRODUCT
SELECT SUM(PSELL) AS TOTALSELL FROM PRODUCT
SELECT COUNT(*) AS TOTALMEMBER FROM MEMBER
SELECT USERID, MESSAGE FROM MESSAGE WHERE STATUS = 'N'
